name: Chain Reaction
description:
Chill out and get creative as you experiment with your own Chain Reactions!

Build up sequences of objects and watch the oddly satisfying result.

Then at the press of the button, magically reset all the pieces. There's no need for a steady hand or extreme patience, here!

Explore and solve many set challenges as you discover a wealth of props and set pieces.

Features


  • Progress through many hours of set challenges to explore and resolve.
  • Explore many different playing pieces from dominos and rockets to rails and mallets.
  • Earn in-game money and purchase the elements you want for your own creations.
  • Customise the aesthetics of your creation's surroundings.
  • Save and return to your creations.
  • Get awarded via many in-game accomlishments.
